Type.Name: SqlMoney

TypeSignature.Value: public struct SqlMoney : IComparable, System.Data.SqlTypes.INullable, System.Xml.Serialization.IXmlSerializable

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

remarks.para: The actual value of the object is stored in .

summary.para: Represents a currency value ranging from -2 63 (or -922,337,203,685,477.5808) to 2 63 -1 (or +922,337,203,685,477.5807) with an accuracy to a ten-thousandth of currency unit to be stored in or retrieved from a database.
